name: Moon monster
description:
DESCRIPTION

Sometimes you will be a weak monster who can only run away from his ennemies. But when the time comes, you become an invicible boss wich can deal with all your problems. The more you kill, the more powerfull you become. But beware, it only lasts for a while.

CONTROLS

The whole game is playable with the mouse.

When you are in weak mode, you run without stopping. You can jump or wall-jump with the left click. A wall-jump changes the direction you go. Against a wall, you can also climb with your right click.

In boss mode, hold the left click to move. With the right upgrade you will be able to dash with your right click.

INFORMATION
This game is the result of only two days of work. It is not a final version and there are some bugs. 

But the game is playable so give it a try ;)
